word:
Your course toward your stepfather was unbecoming. He did not deserve to be treated by you as he was. He had faults 
                                                                           423
and had committed errors, but while you were awake to see these in an aggravated light you did not see your own errors. In the providence of God your wife was prostrated by disease. She was a proud-spirited woman; but she repented of her sins, and her repentance was accepted of God.
